items.title: Seven dead after migrant boat sinks near Thai-Malaysia border
items.description: Hundreds of Rohingyas, who fled Myanmar in hopes of a better life in Malaysia, remain missing.

items.title: Shutdown could reduce US flights 'to a trickle', transport secretary warns
items.description: US lawmakers are working over the weekend as they seek a bipartisan deal to end the shutdown, which is now on day 40.

items.title: Harshita was murdered a year ago - so why has her killer not been caught, family ask
items.description: Police have charged Harshita Brella's husband with murder - but, despite sightings, he remains on the run.

items.title: Mystery 'fedora man' at Louvre heist scene revealed as teenage detective fan
items.description: The mystery youth in the photo turns out to be Pedro Elias Garzon Delvaux, a 15-year-old detective fan.

items.title: British man dies after being shot during robbery in Ghana
items.description: A manhunt is under way for the 68-year-old's killer and other suspects who were at the scene in Tema.
